sentences.en: Another possible way to control juvenile - onset diabetes is the pancreas transplant.
sentences.cn: 控制少年期糖尿病的另一种可行的方法是胰腺移植.

sentences.en: For a grown man he acted in a very juvenile manner.
sentences.cn: 身为成年人,他的行为举止显得十分幼稚.

sentences.en: He is an expert in juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 他是研究青少年犯罪的专家.

sentences.en: He was a blessing to all the juvenile part of the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 邻里的青少年们从他那里简直是得到了一种天惠.

sentences.en: He watched the juvenile flock in their clean frocks and pinafores.
sentences.cn: 他看着那一群小学生,穿着干干净净的连衣裙和围襟.

sentences.en: He's a typical male, as he gets older he becomes more juvenile.
sentences.cn: 他是个典型的男人，年龄越大越孩子气。

sentences.en: Juvenile crime is increasing at a terrifying rate.
sentences.cn: 青少年犯罪正在以惊人的速度增长。

sentences.en: Moreover, the juvenile hormone of insects is closely related to farnesol.
sentences.cn: 此外, 昆虫的“返幼”激素和法尼醇密切相关.

sentences.en: Psychologists are dealing with the problem of maladjusted adolescence and " juvenile delinquency ".
sentences.cn: 心理学家对付着不适应环境的青少年和 “ 青少年犯罪 ” 的问题.

sentences.en: Shortly Tom came upon the juvenile pariah of the village.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,汤姆碰上了村里的少年弃儿.

sentences.en: Some people say that violent movies are potential triggers for juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 一些人说暴力影片可能引起青少年犯罪.

sentences.en: The authorities are at their wits'end about juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 当局对青少年犯罪束手无策.

sentences.en: The number of juveniles in the general population has fallen by a fifth in the past 10 years.
sentences.cn: 在过去的10年中，青少年在总人口中所占的比重下降了1/5。

sentences.en: We can curb juvenile delinquency by education.
sentences.cn: 我们可以通过教育来控制少年犯罪.

phrases.tran_cn: 青少年糖尿病；幼年型糖尿病

trans.tran_cn: 少年的，幼稚的，年少无知的，幼稚的
trans.tran_en: law relating to young people who are not yet adults

trans.tran_cn: 青少年，扮演少年角色的演员，少年读物，羽毛未丰的鸟，雏鸟
trans.tran_en: A juvenile is a child or young person who is not yet old enough to be regarded as an adult
